item.jinxed.sacrificial_book.desc: §8Whoever wrote this knew what they were doing
item.jinxed.memoir.desc: This has been here for decades
item.jinxed.voodoo_doll.desc: Right Click to jinx a mob
item.jinxed.voodoo_doll.desc2: Shift + Right Click while holding an item in your off-hand to Puppeteer
item.jinxed.voodoo_doll_pricked.desc: Right Click after you take damage to harm the Jinxed mob
item.jinxed.voodoo_doll_burnt.desc2: As a consolation, you can use it as fuel in a Furnace
